website_summaries.verdict: A full-coverage concealer with a radiant finish that's still oil-free.
pros: Concealer is truly full coverage, and a little product goes a long way
Covers dark under-eye circles effectively without creasing
Formula stays in place all day on oily skin, even without setting powder
Optical-blurring technology for a natural radiant finish
cons: Tube concealer doesn't come with an applicator

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS VENDOR
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase from this vendor! This is a watered down sharp copycat. I thought it was trustworthy because it cosmetics but IT IS GARBAGE. Just go to sephora and get the real thing. They use the real bottle but cut off the top, fill it with fake stuff then put in a new top
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different formula + no coverage for my dark circles..
customer_reviews.text: This is a different formula.. it doesn’t cover as well at all! Super thin! I have bought this concealer from other buyers and it is way different, a lot thicker (the way it’s suppose to be) this formula is super thin and doesn’t cover well at all. In fact the bottle has a completely different top + can be removed as if someone filled it with their own mix.. very disappointing, because I have dark circles and was looking forward to the coverage and this doesn’t do it.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Omg game changer.
customer_reviews.text: Omg i thought the original was amazing. I usually use a brightening lotion, concealer and then something to illuminate. This was like bingo gold mine! You barely need any just like any IT product. Amazing. I can’t wait to use it w my full face on. So far it’s been like 6 hours and no settling in fine lines. Haven’t attempted the waterproof claim but not too concerned w that. Pic included is this only on undereye. I’m fair and my circles are really purple. I use concealer every day.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing coverage!
customer_reviews.text: OMG........wow. Totally waterproof. Amazing coverage! Does not crease. I live in Florida where it is HOT AND HUMID....I SWAM IN IT with my Tarte Amazonian Clay waterproof foundation over. Nothing budged after an afternoon on the water and splashing around. Highly recommended for the active gal who still wants to look pretty 🙌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor B

customer_reviews.title: Highlights wrinkles & dries like chalk
customer_reviews.text: If you are older and have wrinkles, all this concealer does is magnify them. It dries like chalk and draws attention to the wrinkles. I've even tried using it with different moisturizers. All that does is cause raccoon eyes! Worst concealer ever. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: nunya

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant to purchase concealer without testing the color-match in person, but I'm glad I took a gamble on this. This stuff is pretty serious. While advertised as an under-eye illuminator, it's really a heavy duty-concealer that can be used for under-eye dark circles or blemishes. My only caution is that it's easy to cross the line from the "natural look" to looking like your'e wearing foundation if you apply it liberally. However, it has great staying power and really gets the job done. I'm very pleased with the quality and efficacy for the price. I could easily see the tube lasting me for 4 months or more.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Totally not the same product it was.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this product before and it was amazing.... so I went to purchase it again. I received what looked to be the same container but inside it was a completely different product - different color (it was pink now it’s beige) and a completely different consistency (super thin). What happened??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 50yrs old ***Update
customer_reviews.text: I’m 50 years old and have terrible black circles from the inner corner to outer corner of my eye but no wrinkles. Fantastic coverage But there’s a big BUT Update- The coverage is good but it’s hard to get even coverage since it doesn’t blend easily. By the time it’s blended properly via brush or finger you’ve lost a lot of the coverage you bought it for. So far I’m back to using Revlon color stay foundation under my eyes because it does give good coverage without having to pull and rub on delicate eye skin, is waterproof, and easily glides on. I’m sad about this product because I had high hopes since I love the CC foundation.
customer_reviews.author: RachelK

customer_reviews.title: *updated-bad batch? Poor seller?
customer_reviews.text: *UPDATE* this is my fav concealer but do NOT buy from here. The tube I received is watered down, it’s very oily and loose, it all just clumps together in wrinkles and makes lines everywhere. So disappointed My favorite under eye concealer. I don’t wear foundation or anything besides this and eyeshadow. It’s a great primer for eyeshadow as well as hiding the dark circles under my eyes
customer_reviews.author: Palm Beach Moments Photography

customer_reviews.title: Not real Bye Bye Under Eye!
customer_reviews.text: Once again I should have listened to people reviews! This is NOT authentic ByeBye Under Eye, just a good looking fake. I’ve used that product for years and the consistency of this is totally different. Doesn’t work to cover dark circles. This seller shouldn’t be allowed to sell this crap on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: Really Thorough Coverup
customer_reviews.text: Most under coverups I've used don't really get the job done in covering up my dark under eye circles, leaving me to have to layer on more and more concealer. However, this not only is thick but also matte as opposed to super creamy which causes it to crease and eye make up to run. The matte consistency keeps it in place and the thickness means I need less than a grain of rice to cover both eyes. Really just a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony P.

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: If this product is authentic it’s nothing like the one I just finished. It’s way to thin and not sure what happened just won’t buy this on amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen carey

customer_reviews.title: Product is super thick but does cover well
customer_reviews.text: Product is super thick but does cover well. A little goes a very long way. It is lighter than I thought but that is fine because I put a layer of foundation over it and use a brush to smooth out as well as a velvet primer and the look stays all day!
customer_reviews.author: BPG

customer_reviews.title: I love this concealer
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer. It is a creamy yet “sticky” and thick texture, definitely full coverage but it lasts a long time and blends well if you let it sit on your skin for a few mins before blending. This is my go to concealer for highlighting/contouring.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse89

customer_reviews.title: truly best concealer I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: truly best concealer I have ever tried. And I have been using MAC for years. I now use this. Awesome !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: simone2122

customer_reviews.title: There must be something better.
customer_reviews.text: Given all the great reviews this product has, I was expecting something special. I was disappointed. Even with my daily application of moisturizer and primer, it did not conceal imperfections to any significant extent. It exaggerated wrinkles instead of lessening them. To me, it is a waste of time and money to apply this so-called concealer when my foundation makeup does a better overall job.
customer_reviews.author: Himalayan Consulting

customer_reviews.title: Received a sample in Ipsy
customer_reviews.text: You just need a dot and man it covers well! If you were to use too much, it might fall into fine lines or be cakey, but honestly this stuff rocks. This tube should last 3 years!

customer_reviews.title: There was a hair under the lid.
customer_reviews.text: I dont believe this was the real product. There was a hair in the packaging underneath the closed lid. Also some of the makeup leaked out and was not the same consistency as other it concealers I've used. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product I received is trash
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst bottle I’ve ever received. It does not get tacky, does not cover anything. It was not the same shade as the other bottle I was using (even tho I ordered the light-medium). It’s trash.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Covers my under eye area very well. It’s thicker than I’m used to so be sure to pat your under eye area or use you make up sponge to blend in. A little goes a long way. It’s not illuminating like I thought it would be but otherwise I’m happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Franklin

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed when I tried this KNOCK-OFF. It is a watered down version of the true formula.. it doesn’t cover at all! I have bought this concealer from other sellers and it is way different, a lot thicker (the way it’s suppose to be). this bottle has a removable top. How convenient! This allows the seller to fill it with their own crappy mix.. very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Ninna

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit cosmetic
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake product. I have ordered and used this product many times. This specific one is more liquidy and darker in color, has a slightly larger tube than a legitimate one. I ordered this way before I actually needed it and I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I had seen this infomercial on QVC. I normally wear Merle Norman makeup, which I am VERY pleased with. But being a woman, I thought I would give this new product a try. It doesn't wear like they say it does on TV. I had to reapply throughout the day. In my opinion, this is not worth the money it cost. I will stick with my Merle Norman which I have been wearing for over 35 years.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I have used Bye By Under Eye for a few years and love it. However this product is cakey with terrible coverage. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: G.I.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for 3 year's now, and I'll probably use it for the rest of my life. It's pricey, but worth it. The tube will last for months if you apply it correctly. It blends well with other brand liquid foundations (I use Neutrogena.) Powder foundation also sits well on top of it. My favorite part is it will cover up left over eyeliner that wasn't fully removed. I swear by Bye bye undereye.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria S.

customer_reviews.title: Full coverage and all-day wear
customer_reviews.text: I love the full coverage of this concealer! I have dark circles under my eyes, mostly because of terrible allergies; this concealer hides it all! I have hooded lids so I expected it to crease, but it’s not cakey. I use a translucent, matte setting powder to reduce creasing and to illuminate it even more. A little goes a long way, and it’s long-lasting. I got a sample of this from Ipsy two years ago and I’ve been obsessed with it ever since. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: GaBriella

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same thing that I got from Sephora, quality wise. It’s not the same texture, the color looks a little off, and it definitely doesn’t have the same coverage. I kept using the one I had because there was some left in it and I finally used this one this morning and I hate it. It’s too late for me to send it back and now I need to order a new one from Sephora and I’m out another $28.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi S

customer_reviews.title: Great cover up product
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this in a Birchbox once. It’s great for under your eyes or to cover up blemishes. Worth the price. A little goes a long way. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best undereye concealer out there
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Covers dark circles completely, without creasing or cracking, stays smooth and fresh all day! And a tube will last forever because it only takes a tiny drop to do the job-highly concentrated. You need this concealer!
customer_reviews.author: wayas mom

customer_reviews.title: Watery and not same quality
customer_reviews.text: Not the same quality as the one purchased at Ulta.
customer_reviews.author: C. Caruso

customer_reviews.title: Fake product !
customer_reviews.text: This product was highly recommended by friends .. so I ordered 2 tubes ..I didn’t think it was good at all and then I tried my friends that was purchased from Sephora. This is fake it’s nothing like the real product - it’s thin and I’m upset that I used it near my eyes wondering if it was unsafe 2 tubes that I want to return can’t contact seller !
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I like this better than the original Bye Bye Underage. Makes the area under my eyes and the inner corners look brighter. You only need a very tiny bit. I will repurchase this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: sbb

customer_reviews.title: NOT AUTHENTIC
customer_reviews.text: This product is NOT authentic. The tube is different and the formula is totally off. This is runny and should be thick and also does not cover well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very good concealer BUT a very, very little goes a long way. I suggest putting a small dot on the back of your hand and go from there.
customer_reviews.author: SMM9708

customer_reviews.title: Not for mature skin
customer_reviews.text: Good product, just not for me. Has a beautiful finish but if you have mature, dry or creepy skin do not use. It accentuates the prob areas. After 3 days I ended up red and itchy where i used it. So, not a good choice for me. But if you have young skin its great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC Product!
customer_reviews.text: The best go to make up for covering dark circles under your eyes, or to simply add a little brightness to you eye!! LOVE IT Cosmetics! I got medium and I have Olive skin, it works great with my pigment!
customer_reviews.author: A.V

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to blend -very white
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of great reviews -I find it a little light - kind of white -I May use the medium concealer with this blended together .
customer_reviews.author: erin pelosi

customer_reviews.title: Miracle concealer
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. A tiny ammount could do a whole face. This covers up my dark underete circles and moles and acne scars. It is light weight and doesnt build up in wrinkles. Can be slightly difficult to blend, but does blend well
customer_reviews.author: Megh Shmeg

customer_reviews.title: Effective as under eye illuminator
customer_reviews.text: This is my daily under eye and I like it. Not a heavy concealer, but does reduce the appearance of dark undereye.
customer_reviews.author: JLana

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!! I received an authentic product, it works like a charm!!!! I’m very happy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: FULL COVERAGE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: HELLO! This concealer truly conceals. I first put it on, and WOW, I was so pleased. It's almost paint, it has so much pigment! I love this stuff, it blends out very well, and it does magic for my skin. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: meow

customer_reviews.title: Different/new formula - NOT full coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a different formula from when I’ve purchased in the past. Much thinner and absolutely not full coverage, much more sheer. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Meganr522

customer_reviews.title: Anti-aging and the best coverage. A winner!
customer_reviews.text: Love this as a concealer, love that it’s also helpful to your skin since you’re wearing it all day.
customer_reviews.author: docswife

customer_reviews.title: Consistently in product..
customer_reviews.text: Reliable product.. Wanting to try a different shade, I ordered my go to shade as well as another color.. Upon receiving them. both were my routine shade.. kept both.. won't go to waste..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The concealer goes on smooth and doesn't look cakey.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color match to my skin , I am Caucasian with a medium skin tone, and the color "Medium" went on smooth and covered my dark circles and dark spots on my face and it lasted all day. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicake

customer_reviews.title: How well IT cosmetics work except for this last order
customer_reviews.text: I’m reordering the product. The one I received is not working as well as the last two I used. I don’t know if this tube is a knockoff or IT changed the formula. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Gina C

customer_reviews.title: not for darker tones
customer_reviews.text: shades misleading; great when mixed w/a darker product to match my skin tone, but product it's self is great quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, $10 cheaper on the It Cosmetics website
customer_reviews.text: This concealer is excellent. I received a sample size in my monthly Etsy bag. Long lasting, doesn't crease, flawless coverage. I went to buy the full sized product I found it on Amazon so I was happy about that....until I found it on the It Cosmetics website for over $10 cheaper. Plus free samples thrown in.
customer_reviews.author: monika

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: It’s thick and dry, at least to me. I tried to use it cover my under eye bags and lacrimal grooves but it made them even more standing out by making that part of skin looks greyer than surrounding skin.
customer_reviews.author: Yiwen Li

customer_reviews.title: Fake Product
customer_reviews.text: Please be very cautious when purchasing this product, the vendor who sent mine sent a fake product! This was watered down, completely different formula, I am going to be way more cautious going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Electra Cute

customer_reviews.title: It cosmetics are fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of It cosmetics for several years now, after an early morning infomercial caught my attention. To my great surprise, everything I received exceeded my expectations. Since that time, that's all I buy. The concealer does not cake, but glides on seamlessly, and does lend a brightness to the skin. Love It!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Belles

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is so bright and lovely on the under eye area!
customer_reviews.author: ADR

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible. Goes on cakey, looks awful. Can barely squeeze it out of the bottle it's so thick. Waste of money. 2 stars on presentation because the packaging is very cute.
customer_reviews.author: JFox

customer_reviews.title: Good under eye coverage
customer_reviews.text: By using this product, it hides dark circles under the eye. You only need a very, very, small amount. It is easy to apply and works well. I would not hesitate to buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: NMF

customer_reviews.title: The best I've tried in a long time!
customer_reviews.text: best concealer and illumination I've tried in a long time. you only need a little and it goes a long way and lasts a long time too. Good for older and younger skin. Doesn't lay in the eye lines and covers beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and does what it promises to do. I’ll but again
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Campion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST concealer made! Looks natural but does a great job hiding dark circles.
customer_reviews.author: TCarbonette

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer! It has illuminating qualities and enough pigment to cover dark circles.
customer_reviews.author: California Red

customer_reviews.title: Under eye only
customer_reviews.text: Compliments the very first time I wore this. Makes me look awake and well rested. Does highlight any larger pores so under eye only
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I get compliments on my makeup all time when I wear it. I am a definitely a loyal buyer of this product now!!
customer_reviews.author: Philip & Kathleen Spurrier

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Only takes a drop. Well worth the money. It will last forever. Rub in between fingers to thin it out.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Richey

customer_reviews.title: 10 star rating
customer_reviews.text: Literally covers everything. I received this in my ipsy bag & loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn V.

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE ACTUAL PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this product from a cosmetic store for several years. This IS NOT IT. It has a watery consistency and is translucent. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: A friend of mine had this and I used it ...
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine had this and I used it once and was hooked! I use it daily! Im 48 and need to have some help with my under eye area! It is a thick cream and I am fair so I got the light and it is very light when it’s applied, so use it sparingly and I use a foundation brush to blend.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I think this "light" color is a knock-off product. Watered down and thin- not like the "medium" I usually order.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Featherstone

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Bad Packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It always gives me good coverage over any dark spots or problem areas. I, however, didn’t like the packaging because it exploded out the back 3 days after I received it, and that wasted a lot of the makeup. They sell it in a more durable tube if you just buy it at Ulta.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product looked like chalk under my eyes and didn't spread easily. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: It really is worth the money, good coverage, I wear it evrday, wilk buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: RV

customer_reviews.title: Great undereye concealer.
customer_reviews.text: WOW!! This concealer works great!!! Just a little goes a long way. Fantastic concealer... no more dark circles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Says what it does
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a LONG way. This product works! Covers my dark circles ... or should I say black circles under my eyes
customer_reviews.author: susana5019

customer_reviews.title: Creases
customer_reviews.text: The formula is definitely full coverage, but I thin it with another concealer. It also creases horribly under the eye despite being set.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Knight

customer_reviews.title: Try this product and fall in love.
customer_reviews.text: This is a reorder, excellent product I'm 66 it's perfect for any age.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui Applebury

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! Love the coverage love how it makes me look fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Katlamb

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Have used other concealers but none have done the job like this one! A little goes a long way and lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Dayne Maple

customer_reviews.title: Too thick
customer_reviews.text: Awful. So thick, no applicator I own would ever work it into my skin. It felt like dry chalk under my eyes. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: PDX1981

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: Not the usual stuff I buy. Same package but not as thick.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Page

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Item seemed like it was used when I received it. I wouldn't recommend wasting money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: BT6713

customer_reviews.title: so so, too much hype if you ask me
customer_reviews.text: I expected more from this, dont like the way it blends. I should have taken a slighter darker shade i feel. I'll look for an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best undereye concealer I've tried and I've tried them all!
customer_reviews.author: electra

customer_reviews.title: Great for aging eyes and dark circles
customer_reviews.text: This is light enough to not sit in those lines and wrinkles, but thick enough to cover dark circles. It's buildable, which helps cover the circles. Even my teenage daughter is jealous of this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Tipps

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product came highly recommended to me, but I need to try a shade darker.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: I never liked an under eye cream enough to buy it separately
customer_reviews.text: This stuff makes my skin glow. I bought the full size after squeezing the very last drop from a free sample I've been using the past few weeks. I never liked an under eye cream enough to buy it separately. This has become my go-to product above any other makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Cassondra A. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I received a bad batch but...
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of this product a while backand loved it so I decided to purchase it. Definitely not the same. The bye bye under eye that I recently purchased is more watery and does not cover as well as the sample I received from Ipsy.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed very much
customer_reviews.text: I love IT products, but this was not one of them. Product is not like the original, it was definitely tampered with or not the real product.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: ... product in an Ipsy bag and instantly fell in love. It does have a think texture but it ...
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this product in an Ipsy bag and instantly fell in love. It does have a think texture but it applies really nicely.
customer_reviews.author: MonaLisa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. It last a long time especially when set with powder and definitely lives up to it’s name. I use it to cover tattoos
customer_reviews.author: Mitzy

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST undereye concealer I've used
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST undereye concealer I've used. I'm in my 40's so need something to brighten up the skin under my eyes and this has just enough illumination but not too much to look like I'm going out to the clubs!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R Oeltjen

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: So great... sits on the skin well and doesn't seep into wrinkles. Fantastic concealer. You only need the TINIEST amount for application.
customer_reviews.author: msog177

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one and it was authentic I came back and ordered another one and it was watered down and no coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Zuly

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: BEST CONCEALER EVER! good coverage good color and not really cakey, worth the price for sure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit. Slides right off.
customer_reviews.text: The true product by IT Cosmetics is a bit tacky and covers very well, and stays on all day. This does not. At all. It's a counterfeit version. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Changed formula ( disappointing )
customer_reviews.text: The low review was not due to seller or seller response . Box arrived flattened . Above all the product is nothing like the original Anti-aging concealer . The change they made was not a pair I’ve one .
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Dominick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful coverage
customer_reviews.text: Coverage is perfect, doesn’t look thick but covers like it does.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay- covers for a while but I didn’t think it lasted. It’s thick which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Adam mu

customer_reviews.title: I'm in Love!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this twice now, and I really love this product!
customer_reviews.author: marinda boykin

customer_reviews.title: I'm in LOVE with this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm in LOVE with this product! Works great in covering under eye lines and also help cover large pores. Definitely will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Karen P.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money, I returned the product. I was very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mills

customer_reviews.title: last forever
customer_reviews.text: amazing coverage using a brush use tiny amount 1/2 of a grain of rice
customer_reviews.author: leslie MV

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for your Buck!
customer_reviews.text: I just came back to re-order this and realized it last A WHOLE YEAR, so I figured I ought to say something about that! It is a very thick product, but a very small amount goes really far and always looks great and STAYS PUT FOREVER. I'll never be able to use any other concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Surber

customer_reviews.title: Covers well but can get cakey
customer_reviews.text: All in all, it’s a nice concealer. It covers well but it applies very heavy/cakey. I have to apply it to my hand, rub a little and then apply under my eye. Dries quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Colon

product_meta.title: IT Cosmetics Bye Bye Under Eye Illumination Full Coverage Anti-Aging Concealer: Medium NEW!!
product_meta.description: Size:0.28 Fl Oz| Color:Medium (Light-Medium)Your best-selling, award winning Bye Bye Under Eye Anti-Aging Concealer just got brighter! Experience the same highly pigmented, full-coverage, waterproof concealer that covers absolutely everything and won't crease or crack-now with Drops of Light Technology for added radiance and a lit-from-within glow.
feature_bullets: IT’S YOUR LIFE-CHANGING CONCEALER—ILLUMINATED! Full Coverage Anti-Aging Waterproof Concealer

Bye Bye Under Eye Illumination contains anti-aging peptides, vitamins, hydrolyzed collagen, hyaluronic acid and antioxidants, to improve the appearance of wrinkles and effectively conceal the look of skin imperfections including dark circles, bags, redness, hyperpigmentation, broken capillaries, age spots and discoloration.
ORIGINAL Medium Shade. Size: 0.28 FL OZ UNBOXED
BEAUTY TIPS: Using your IT Cosmetics Dual Airbrush Concealer Brush #2, blend Bye Bye Under Eye Illumination around your eyes, nose and lips to instantly erase the look of imperfections.
